Translations.Text: Ini: "a yimdanen! Nek, $uowen, d aneddao kan ipbegginen
I wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid iaanan asfunneg issekniyen nne£, widak d at ujajie
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, amazan ne$ nnbi, mebla ma ikecm ed Cciian, deg wayen imenna, ma imenna. Itekkes Oebbi ayen d issekcam Cciian, sinna, Itebbit issekniyen iS. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Iwakken ad Irr aggway n Cciian d ahewwel, i at wulawen iblan akked at wulawen aquoan. Ih, imednas atnan di t$ennant tu$miqt
Iwakken ad eoen wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, ar neppa d tidep, s$uo Mass ik. Ad amnen yis. Ad as anzen wulawen nnsen. Oebbi, s tidep, Inehhu wid iumnen, s abrid uwqim
Zgan wid ijehlen di ccekk fellas, ar ten id ias yimir, deqzalla, ne$ ibbwev iten id uaaqeb n wass abarar
Assen, tagelda i Oebbi. Ad Ieudd garasen. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad ilin di Loennet n ssuaada
I wid ijehlen, iskaddben issekniyen nne£, aaaqeb isdullun
